content:
Hi everyone,

We are releasing a bug fix for Dataverse 6.7.1 that fixes a performance problem when loading the "create dataset" and "edit dataset pages". Please see issue #11700 for details.

--Ceilyn
Thanks, Ceilyn. Here's a direct link to the release notes: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/releases/tag/v6.7.1

@Philip Durbin ðŸš€ I do plan on generating SchemaSpy docs for this release, but I'm also delegating it as a learning experiment for my grad student turned employee, William Hahn. SchemaSpy for 6.7.1 will show up once I walk him through the process.
Wonderful! Thanks @William Hahn! :heart:
